thread.section_title: LuxHair Wigs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LuxHair Wigs | www.luxhair.com | 3 of 5
thread.title: Dianna Puckett
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Dianna Puckett

author: Dianna Puckett
title: Dianna Puckett
text:
I have Sickle Cell disease, and diabetes, along with depression and anxiety. I have been on many medications for each one. I also have Red Blood Cell Exchange ever 8 weeks. My hair started falling out and I don't like the way I look anymore. That's why I thought of buying some wigs to allow my hair to regrow. I know Sherri put her heart and soul into making women feel pretty again. I can't wait to see myself for the first time looking not only pretty, but fabulous again.
Thanks
